statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME TIP-OFF TOURNAMENT AT SPRINGFIELD MA

article.description: Sam Maniscalco sank three free throws with 0.3 seconds left and Bradley rallied to defeat Southern Cal 64-63 on Saturday in the Hall of Fame Tip-Off Classic.
article.headline: Bradley sinks USC with last-second free throws
article.linkText: Bradley sinks USC with last-second free throws
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mass. -- Sam Maniscalco sank three free throws with 0.3 seconds left and Bradley rallied to defeat Southern Cal 64-63 on Saturday in the Hall of Fame Tip-Off Classic. The Braves pulled off a second-half comeback for the third straight game, overcoming a 54-46 deficit with 5:22 left. Bradley is 4-0 for the first time since 2006-07, when the Braves were 5-0 en route to a 22-13 record. Maniscalco, who finished with 17 points, also hit a 3-pointer with 58.6 seconds remaining to give Bradley a 61-59 lead. Nicola Vucevic, who led the Trojans (2-2) with 22 points and 15 rebounds, was fouled with 39 seconds left and the Bradley bench was assessed a technical on the play. Vucecic hit all four of his free throws but missed two more foul shots with 11 seconds to go. Andrew Warren added 14 points for the Braves and freshman Walt Lemon Jr. scored 10 of his 13 points after the break.
